cz.syntea.xdef

Interface XDDebug


  • public interface XDDebug
    Interface fro debug mode.

        void setInDebug(java.io.InputStream inDebug)
        set debug InputStream.

      • debug

        int debug(XXNode xxNode,
          XDValue[] code,
          int pc,
          int sp,
          XDValue[] stack,
          XDValue[] localVariables,
          XMDebugInfo debugInfo,
          XDCallItem callList,
          int stepMode)
   throws java.lang.Error
        This method is called from x-script methods pause or trace.
        Parameters:
        xxNode - actual XXNode.
        code - executive code.
        pc - program counter.
        sp - stack pointer.
        stack - stack.
        localVariables - array with local variables.
        debugInfo - XMDebugInfo object.
        callList - call list.
        stepMode - step mode (NOSTEP, STEPINTO, STEPOVER).
        Returns:
        step mode.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - if program should stop.

      • clearStopAddrs

        void clearStopAddrs()
        Clear XScript breakpoint area.

      • hasStopAddr

        boolean hasStopAddr(int addr)
        Check if breakpoint area contains the stop address.
        Parameters:
        addr - where to search.
        Returns:
        true if breakpoint area contains the stop address.

      • setStopAddr

        void setStopAddr(int addr)
        Set stop address to the breakpoint area.
        Parameters:
        addr - stop address. If value of argument is -1 debugger is closed.

      • removeStopAddr

        boolean removeStopAddr(int addr)
        Remove stop address from the breakpoint area.
        Parameters:
        addr - stop address.
        Returns:
        true stop address was removed.

      • clearXPosArea

        void clearXPosArea()
        Clear XPos breakpoint area.

      • hasXPos

        boolean hasXPos(java.lang.String xpos)
        Check if breakpoint area contains the XPos item.
        Parameters:
        xpos - XPos item.
        Returns:
        true if breakpoint area contains the XPos item.

      • setXpos

        void setXpos(java.lang.String xpos)
        Set XPos item to the breakpoint area.
        Parameters:
        xpos - the string with XPos item.

      • removeXpos

        void removeXpos(java.lang.String xpos)
        Remove XPos item from the breakpoint area.
        Parameters:
        xpos - the string with XPos item.
